title: Stock market news live updates: Stocks extend losses as inflation, interest rate worries persist - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stocks extend losses as inflation, interest rate worries persist  Yahoo Finance
description: U.S. stocks pared morning losses Thursday as markets attempted to come back from a recent losing streak spurred by continued inflationary pressures and renewed worries the Federal Reserve's inflation-mitigating efforts may be more aggressive than anticipated.
